results.overview: 10 number one hits. More than 2 billion streams. Yet rap superstar Apache 207 is a mystery. Now he breaks his silence and grants access to camera crews. This compelling documentary shows his life, from plattenbau to luxury mansions, from loneliness to sold-out stadiums - accompanied by his family, best friends and rap icons Loredana, BAUSA and XATAR.
results.title: Apache Stays Apache

results.overview: Moving A Body is a single-channel black-and-white video with diegetic sounds. The video depicts a person trying to move an immobile body, a performance about carrying or trying to navigate something that is bigger than all of us.
results.title: Moving A Body

results.overview: A bereaved Satanist couple kidnap a pregnant woman so they can use an ancient spellbook to put their dead grandson's spirit into her unborn child, but they end up summoning more than they bargained for.
results.title: Anything for Jackson

results.overview: Clara is studying for a Ph.D in philosophy in Berlin. In this middle-class male academic environment, she feels pushed to one side. She returns to her childhood village in former East Germany for her mother's birthday, and becomes aware that a distance has grown between her and her family.
results.title: Talking About the Weather

results.overview: Through five stories, the movie addresses sex and love: Paco and Ana are a marriage looking for reactivate the passion of their sexual relations, long time unsatisfied; Jose Luis tries to recover the affections of his wife Paloma, sit down on a wheelchair after an accident which has limited her mobility; Mª Candelaria and Antonio are a marriage trying by all way to be parents, but she has the trouble that no get an orgasm when make love with him; Álex try to satisfy Natalia's fantasies, while she starts to doubt if he finally will ask her in marriage; and finally, Sandra is a single woman in a permanent searching for a man to fall in love. All them love, fear, live and explore their diverse sexual paraphilias and the different sides of sexuality, trying to find the road to happiness.
results.title: Kiki, Love to Love

results.overview: In a desperate bid to reunite with his daughter, an armed man bursts into the medical center where his estranged wife works and kidnaps her.
results.title: A Day and a Half

results.overview: Year 1763. Forced into exile, the famous libertine Giacomo Casanova leaves Paris and travels to London, where he meets Marianne de Charpillon, a young prostitute to whom he is so attracted that he forgets about the other women.
results.title: Casanova, Last Love

results.original_title: Forky Asks a Question: What Is Art?
results.overview: Mr. Pricklepants tells Forky about the complexities of being an actor and the art of performance.
results.title: Forky Asks a Question: What Is Art?

results.overview: Detective Axel Foley is back on the beat in Beverly Hills. After his daughter Jane’s life is threatened, she and Foley team up with a new partner and old pals Billy Rosewood and John Taggart to turn up the heat and uncover a conspiracy.
results.title: Beverly Hills Cop: Axel F

results.overview: Fred is cast as Ebenezer Scrooge in a stage adaption of the classic Christmas story, but is acting a bit stingy in real life.
results.title: A Flintstones Christmas Carol

results.original_title: The Best of Beavis and Butt-Head: Hard Cash
results.overview: Sometimes, that fat check from Burger World just isn't enough. So Beavis and Butt-Head are out to make a few extra bucks. See the world would be entrepreneurs molest the concept of free enterprise as they invent the butt scratcher, photocopy nickels, drill for oil in the backyard, and sell stuff that's not theirs. Bowing down to the almighty dollar never made less cents.
results.title: The Best of Beavis and Butt-Head: Hard Cash

results.overview: Arriving in Helsinki, a nameless man is beaten within an inch of his life by thugs, miraculously recovering only to find that he has completely lost his memory. Back on the streets, he attempts to begin again from zero, befriending a moody dog and becoming besotted with a Salvation Army volunteer.
results.title: The Man Without a Past

results.overview: The Roman taxi driver Pietro Marchetti finds himself to witness a mafia crime. Having to testify at the trial, he is checked by the police, especially when he has to go to the United States to attend the graduation of his son Francesco.
results.title: A Taxi Driver in New York

results.overview: Professor Paris Catalano visits Venice, to investigate the last known appearance of the famous vampire Nosferatu during the carnival of 1786.
results.title: Nosferatu in Venice

results.original_title: I Am a Fugitive from a Chain Gang
results.overview: A World War I veteran’s dreams of becoming a master architect evaporate in the cold light of economic realities. Things get even worse when he’s falsely convicted of a crime and sent to work on a chain gang.
results.title: I Am a Fugitive from a Chain Gang

results.overview: Early in the 20th century, middle-aged lawyer Fredrik Egerman and his young wife, Anne, have still not consummated their marriage, while Fredrik's son finds himself increasingly attracted to his new stepmother. To make matters worse, Fredrik's old flame Desiree makes a public bet that she can seduce him at a romantic weekend retreat where four couples convene, swapping partners and pairing off in unexpected ways.
results.title: Smiles of a Summer Night

results.overview: The intriguing relationship between three desperados, who try to kidnap a wealthy child in hope of turning their lives around.
results.title: After Dark, My Sweet

results.original_title: Marina Abramović: The Artist Is Present
results.overview: Performance artist Marina Abramovic prepares for a major retrospective of her work at the Museum of Modern Art in New York.
results.title: Marina Abramović: The Artist Is Present
